title: An Act relative to PFML for bone marrow and organ donation

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Haggerty of Woburn, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Richard M. Haggerty for legislation to include bone marrow and organ donation in the paid family and medical leave program.  Labor and Workforce Development.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on House Rules
Reported, referred to the committee on Joint Rules, reported, rules suspended and referred to the committee on Labor and Workforce Development
